=== ABS ===
Returns the absolute value.
ABS is an action value.
==== Arguments ==== 
: '''value''' -- (Type: number! pair! money! time!)


==== Description ==== 


Returns a positive value equal in magnitude.


&lt;code&gt;&lt;pre&gt;
print absolute -123

print absolute -1:23
&lt;/pre&gt;&lt;/code&gt;
